## LogsGlobal.setUser() method

Set user information to all events, stored in `@usr`

See \[User context\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/logs/log\_collection/javascript/\#user-context) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setUser(newUser: User & {
        id: string;
    }): void;
```
